mapper.select: select count(*) from t_pass_review review left join t_owner o on o.id = review.owner_id left join t_user tu on tu.id = o.user_id left join t_house th on th.id = review.house_id left join t_community tc on tc.id = th.community_id left join t_door td on td.community_id = tc.id where review.deleted = 0 and review.status = 1 and tu.id = #{userId} and td.id = #{doorId}
